00073 /* public functions */
00074 
00075 public:
00076         HAL_UART(UART_IDX uartIdx);
00077 
00078         /* Initialization of uart interface: mode 8N1, no HW flow control*/
00079         int init(unsigned int baudrate = 115200);
00080 
00081         /* disable interface and set all its registers and pins to its reset state */
00082         void reset();
00083 
00084         /* Configuration of uart interface AFTER initialization */
00085         int config(UART_PARAMETER_TYPE type, int paramVal);
00086 
00087         int status(UART_STATUS_TYPE type);
00088 
00089 
00090         bool readyToSend();
00091         bool dataReady();
00092 
00093         /* write()
00094          * blocking -> returns only if "sendBuf" is sent
00095          * TODO: transmit buffer & transmit interrupts for non-blocking operation
00096          */
00097         int write(const char* sendBuf, int len);
00098         /* read()
00099          * non-blocking -> returns when uart-receive-buffer is empty or "recBuf" is full
00100          */
00101         int read(char* recBuf, int maxLen);
00102         //int writeRead(const char* sendBuf, int len, char* recBuf, int maxLen)         {return 0;}
00103 
00104         int getcharNoWait();            // returns character on success else -1
00105         int putcharNoWait(char c);      // returns c on success else -1
